items.title: WSDOT travel advisory: SR 520 closed across Lake Washington over the weekend starting late Friday night, Dec. 1
items.content_text: Weekend travelers who use State Route 520 across Lake Washington should prepare for a 54-hour around-the-clock closure beginning Friday, Dec. 1 at 11 p.m. and wrapping up Monday, Dec. 4 at 5 a.m, according to the Washington State Department of Transportation. The SR 520 Trail is also closed across the lake. Drivers, bicyclists, and pedestrians...

items.title: Travel back in time and watch this special Christmas reenactment
items.content_text: Museum of the American G.I. has a new event coming soon about a time in history called the Christmas Truce. When the countries of Europe went to war in the summer of 1914, they believed the conflict would be over by Christmas.

items.title: Data from over 4,700 travel influencers shows what hotels, cruises, and other companies offer in partnership deals. Here are 3 key takeaways.
